statements: UPDATE KPI_reports SET inventory_turnover_rate = 5.72, order_fulfillment_rate = 98.3 WHERE report_id = 1002;
UPDATE KPI_reports SET order_fulfillment_rate = 99.6, inventory_turnover_rate = 6.21 WHERE report_id = 1004;

UPDATE KPI_reports SET report_date = '2022-09-15', inventory_turnover_rate = 3.8 WHERE report_id = 456
UPDATE dbo.Inventory SET product_name = 'Laptop', quantity = 20 WHERE id = 1001;
UPDATE dbo.Orders SET fulfillment_rate = 0.8, order_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE order_id = 5002;
UPDATE dbo.Inventory SET quantity = 100, turnover_rate = 0.05 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE dbo.Orders SET fulfillment_rate = 0.75, customer_id = 1001 WHERE order_id = 200;
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = 50 WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE orders SET total_amount = 200.50, order_date = '2023-12-15' WHERE order_id = 201;
UPDATE inventory SET unit_price = 15.99, quantity = quantity - 5 WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE orders SET total_amount = total_amount + 50.75, order_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE order_id = 201;
UPDATE inventory_metrics SET inventory_count = 50 WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE fulfillment_metrics SET fulfillment_status = 'Shipped' WHERE order_id = 201;
UPDATE inventory_metrics SET inventory_count = 1000, inventory_turnover = 2.5 WHERE product_id = 12345;
UPDATE order_metrics SET order_total = 500.75, customer_id = 98765 WHERE order_id = 54321;
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = 50 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE orders SET status = 'SHIPPED' WHERE order_id = 100;
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = quantity + 5, cost_price = 25.50 WHERE id = 101
UPDATE orders SET total_amount = total_amount - 100.75, status = 'Shipped' WHERE order_id = 201
